name: Open Source APIs for Audio File Formats
summary: The audio file format is a category of digital file formats for representation of audio information along with its meta-data. A number of Audio file formats exist based on the nature of data contained within the audio file. Such files can be stored in compressed as well as uncompressed audio file formats. Popular audio file formats include MP3, WAV, PCM and WMA. You can find the file structure details and internal file format of these file types in the following articles.

instructions: Check out the Open Source APIs for working with Audio File Formats.
